Moteur Multi-blog multi-utilisateur multilingue.

Bienvenue!

b2evolution is a PHP multilingual multiuser multiblog engine. You will find complete information on the official b2evolution website.

Quickstart instructions:

You can setup b2evolution in a just a few minutes. Just follow the instructions matching your situation:

  • New users: installing b2evolution from scratch
  • Existing b2evolution users: upgrading from a previous version of b2evolution
  • Cafelog/b2 users: upgrading from b2 version 0.6.x
